setExperiment

Class CrossValidationSeparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • setExperiment.CrossValidationSeparator

  • public class CrossValidationSeparator
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads the dataset and prepares the data for the n-fold-cross validation experiment described in:

    F. Feger and I. Koprinska. Co–training Using RBF Nets and Different Feature Splits. In Proceedings of 2006 International Joint Conference on Neural Network, pp. 1878–1885, 2006.

    • Field Detail

      • originalFiles

        protected weka.core.Instances[] originalFiles
        Loaded original files. Each Instances object form the array corresponds to one view

    • Constructor Detail

      • CrossValidationSeparator

        public CrossValidationSeparator()

    • Method Detail

      • createFolds

        private weka.core.Instances[][] createFolds()
        Divides the data in n parts of roughly equal size.
        Returns:
        : data divided in folds. The first dimension corresponds to fold and the second dimension corresponds to different views of that fold.

      • chooseLabeled

        private weka.core.Instances[] chooseLabeled(weka.core.Instances[] data)
        Chooses the predefined number of labeled examples per each class from the given dataset
        Parameters:
        data - data to choose labeled examples from. Elements of the the array (each Instance object) correspond to different view of the data
        Returns:
        chosen labeled instances. Each Instance object (element from the returned array) corresponds to a different view of the data

      • loadOriginalFiles

        private void loadOriginalFiles()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the data files that will be divided for n-fold-cross validation
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception -
        • the ARFF file is missing
        • class attribute is missing (there is no attribute in the dataset that matches the name of the class attribute given in the data properties)
        • adding an id attribute failed

      • prepareCrossValidationExperiment

        public CoTrainingData[] prepareCrossValidationExperiment()
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the data and prepares the n-fold-cross validation experiment
        Returns:
        array of prepared CoTrainingData objects, each corresponding to one labeled/unlabeled/test split in n-fold-cross validation experiment
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the dataset files are missing or corrupt
